text: When I first attended one of your Art of Low Demand parenting webinars, I experienced a tremendous sense of relief and vindication.
author: Art of Low Demand Parenting webinar attendee

text: It was liberating to be given the green light and to realise that my gut had been right all along.
author: Art of Low Demand Parenting webinar attendee

text: It was such an energy boost and a comfort to feel seen and understood as we start this new term, take a deep breath and go again. Thank you Naomi and Eliza!
author: Art of Low Demand Parenting webinar attendee

text: I wanted to say thank you so much for this webinar, I have just watched it on playback and it is enormously helpful. It had me in tears at several points (in a good way!) because it was so relatable.
author: Art of Low Demand Parenting webinar attendee

text: Totally changed my own view of ‘good’ parenting. I always come alongside now and almost never go head to head. Sooo much calmer for us all.
author: Art of Low Demand Parenting webinar attendee
